title: Farscape, Vol. 5: Red Sky at Morning
description: The crew of Moya take in all they've seen recently. Crichton, Aeryn and especially Chiana will never be the same. But soon it will be another member of the ship thrust into the harsh spotlight. The crew visits... Pilot's homeworld. A don't miss FARSCAPE graphic novel written by re show creator Rockne S O'Bannon!
author: Rockne S. O'Bannon
